loyalty.title: Loyalty Programs
loyalty.description: Join projects and earn recognition by tweeting about them. We only count posts that tag a single loyalty program. That is, if you tag multiple loyalty programs in a single post, your post will be filtered out. We value quality content over quantity. Well-written posts discussing a project's features will be weighted higher than simply tagging it in a bull post.
loyalty.joinedSuccess: You have successfully joined the project
loyalty.leftSuccess: You have successfully left the project
loyalty.followerRequirementDesc: One or more programs require a higher follower count than you currently have. You were only joined to programs where you meet the requirements.

howItWorks.line1: Each mention awards reputation points to both the giver and tweet author. Users have 3 points daily to give away.
howItWorks.line2: Not all reputation points are equal! Mentions from influencers are worth more points.
